description: React component for instructor course detail page with module, chapter management, quiz creation, and publish functionality.

methods.name: getContentIcon
methods.description: Returns icon component based on content type.

methods.name: handleModuleReorder
methods.description: Reorders modules array based on drag-and-drop.

methods.name: handleContentReorder
methods.description: Reorders chapter content within a module.

methods.name: addModule
methods.description: Adds a new module to the course.

methods.name: addChapter
methods.description: Adds a new chapter/content item to a module.

methods.name: updateModuleTitle
methods.description: Updates the title of a module.

methods.name: updateChapter
methods.description: Updates properties of a chapter/content item.

methods.name: deleteChapter
methods.description: Deletes a chapter/content item from a module.

methods.name: toggleChapterPublished
methods.description: Toggles published state of a chapter.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves course modules and updates backend.

methods.name: handlePublish
methods.description: Publishes the course, syncing with backend, creating if necessary.
